subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: England coach Martin Johnson dismissed talk of a Grand Slam - which would be England's first since 2003 - after his rugby team beat France at Twickenham. Elsewhere, Wales beat Italy.
snippet: England coach Martin Johnson dismissed talk of a Grand Slam - which would be England's first since 2003 - after his rugby team beat France at Twickenham. Elsewhere, Wales beat Italy.
